CustomField.formula: IF( OR( MONTH(TODAY()) > MONTH( DATE( VALUE(LEFT( person_2_personnummer__c ,4)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,5,2)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,7,2)) )), AND( MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH( DATE( VALUE(LEFT(person_2_personnummer__c ,4)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,5,2)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,7,2)) )), DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY( DATE( VALUE(LEFT(person_2_personnummer__c ,4)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,5,2)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,7,2)) )) ) ), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(DATE( VALUE(LEFT(person_2_personnummer__c ,4)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,5,2)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,7,2)) )), YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(DATE( VALUE(LEFT(person_2_personnummer__c ,4)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,5,2)), VALUE(MID(person_2_personnummer__c ,7,2)) )) - 1 )
CustomField.label: Person 2 Age
